title: Smart Data Models - Digital Innovation Hub
description: Digital Innovation Hubs are one-stop-shops that help companies to become more competitive with regard to their business/production processes.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be DigitalInnovationHub

website.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Website of the Digital Innovation Hub.

logo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. URL of the logo of the Digital Innovation Hub.

location.description: GeoProperty. Model:'https://geojson.org/schema/Point.json'. GeoJSON Point reference to the location of the Digital Innovation Hub.

address.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/PostalAddress'. PostalAddress of the Digital Innovation Hub.

representatives.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Representatives of the Digital Innovation Hub.

domain.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Domain of the Digital Innovation Hub.

competences.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Competences of the Digital Innovation Hub.

socialAccounts.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. SocialAccounts of the Digital Innovation Hub.

relation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Relations of the Digital Innovation Hub Service.

dateSubmitted.description: Property. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTC format. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

dateUpdated.description: Property. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTC format. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'
